name: Cakes
description: A knowledge graph about different types of cakes including ingredients, preparation methods, flavors, and baking techniques

nodes.label: Cake
nodes.description: Sweet baked dessert typically made from flour, sugar, eggs, and butter

nodes.label: Chocolate Cake
nodes.description: Rich cake made with cocoa powder or melted chocolate

nodes.label: Vanilla Cake
nodes.description: Classic cake flavored with vanilla extract

nodes.label: Strawberry Cake
nodes.description: Cake made with fresh strawberries or strawberry flavoring

nodes.label: Red Velvet Cake
nodes.description: Southern American cake with distinctive red color and cream cheese frosting

nodes.label: Cheesecake
nodes.description: Sweet dessert with a thick, creamy filling of cheese, eggs, and sugar

nodes.label: Carrot Cake
nodes.description: Moist cake made with grated carrots, spices, and often topped with cream cheese frosting

nodes.label: Flour
nodes.description: Powder made by grinding grains, essential ingredient in cake baking

nodes.label: Sugar
nodes.description: Sweet crystalline substance used to sweeten cakes

nodes.label: Eggs
nodes.description: Used as binding agent and leavening in cake recipes

nodes.label: Butter
nodes.description: Dairy product used for richness and moisture in cakes

nodes.label: Cocoa Powder
nodes.description: Powdered form of chocolate used in chocolate cakes

nodes.label: Strawberries
nodes.description: Fresh fruit used in strawberry cakes for flavor and decoration

nodes.label: Baking Powder
nodes.description: Leavening agent that helps cakes rise

nodes.label: Frosting
nodes.description: Sweet coating or filling for cakes

nodes.label: Cream Cheese Frosting
nodes.description: Frosting made from cream cheese, butter, and powdered sugar

nodes.label: Chocolate Frosting
nodes.description: Rich frosting made with chocolate and butter

nodes.label: Baking
nodes.description: Cooking method using dry heat in an oven

nodes.label: Layer Cake
nodes.description: Cake made with multiple layers stacked with frosting between

nodes.label: Sheet Cake
nodes.description: Single-layer cake baked in a rectangular pan
